Package au.edu.anu.twcore.rngFactory

Interface RngHolder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DynamicSpace<T>, ObserverDynamicSpace, TwFunction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDecisionFunction, ChangeCategoryDecisionFunction, ChangeOtherStateFunction, ChangeRelationStateFunction, ChangeStateFunction, CreateOtherDecisionFunction, DeleteDecisionFunction, FlatSurface, MaintainRelationDecisionFunction, RelateToDecisionFunction, SetInitialStateFunction, SetOtherInitialStateFunction, SpaceAdapter, SquareGrid, TwFunctionAdapter
    public interface RngHolder
    An interface for objects that hold a random number generator (RNG)
    Author:
    Jacques Gignoux - 5 f√©vr. 2020

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String defRngName
      The name of the 3worlds default RNG

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default java.util.Random defaultRng​(int index)
      returns the same instance of the default 3Worlds RNG for a given index value
      java.util.Random rng()
      return the unique rng associated to the instance
      void setRng​(java.util.Random rng)
      sets the rng (meant to be used once per instance
